Code.Name: No Issue
Code.Description: Indicates that receiver of the documents sends the message just to update the status and there are no problems with document processing

Code.Name: References incorrect
Code.Description: Indicates that the received document did not contain references as required by the receiver for correctly routing the document for approval or processing.

Code.Name: Legal information incorrect
Code.Description: Information in the received document is not according to legal requirements.

Code.Name: Receiver unknown
Code.Description: The party to which the document is addressed is not known.

Code.Name: Delivery issues
Code.Description: Delivery proposed or provided is not acceptable.

Code.Name: Prices incorrect
Code.Description: Prices not according to previous expectation.

Code.Name: Quantity incorrect
Code.Description: Quantity not according to previous expectation.

Code.Name: Items incorrect
Code.Description: Items not according to previous expectation.

Code.Name: Payment terms incorrect
Code.Description: Payment terms not according to previous expectation.

Code.Name: Finance incorrect
Code.Description: Finance terms not according to previous expectation.

Code.Name: Partially Paid
Code.Description: Payment is partially but not fully paid.

Code.Name: Other
Code.Description: Reason for status is not defined by code.
